channel.title: Display as link using query parameters
channel.description: Hi, I would like to know if there's a way to use the parameters for displaying a link in the query results table. Using {{column_name}} works for all the columns but not for the parameters, so wondering if there's a different syntax for parameters or do I need to have the parameters as columns in order to use them in a URL template. Thank you

item.title: Display as link using query parameters
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
gsasson:

or do I need to have the parameters as columns in order to use them in a URL template.

This is the answer. Parameters are not otherwise available to the link formatting context.

Read full topic
item.source: Display as link using query parameters
